recipesJson.name: Chocolate Kwik
recipesJson.author: Kemmo
recipesJson.description: The are hundreds, probably thousands of strawberries and cream/milk recipe's out there. Which is great, but here's a different take a creamy milk based liquid. There's not much else to say, it's a simple and well balanced chocolate, sweetened milk that won't destroy your coil too kwik... see what i did there, i hate myself for that pun but i'm too tired to care. Enjoy!
